sample_text:

title: CANCELLATION CLAUSE
sample_text:

which this endorsement is issued, there shall be no refund of premium allowed for 
cancellation of the Terrorism risk insurance during the period of insurance except 
where such cancellation is done along with the cancellation of the basic insurance. 
Where a policy is cancelled and rewritten mid-term purely for the purpose of 
coinciding with the accounting year of the insured, pro-rate refund of the cancelled 
policy premium will be allowed.
